name: USES_SAFE_SEX
description: This table contains patient information related to the birth control / protection category that represents what a patient uses for safe sex.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: USES_SAFE_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description: The birth control / protection category ID for the patient's current encounter representing what a patient uses for safe sex. There can be multiple IDs associated with one encounter.
